skillTree.name: Haunted Shrine
skillTree.description: The Maiden of the Black Lotus spreads her corruption atop this unholy structure, causing the magic winds to contort and twist in eerie fashion in her midst.

effects.description: Mount: Haunted Shrine

skillTree.name: Curse of the Revenant
skillTree.description: The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.name: Supernatural Horror
skillTree.description: To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Terror

skillTree.name: Grave Ward
skillTree.description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Unholy Boon
skillTree.description: Religious icons, although having been long tainted by evil, still possess some sort of protective power, albeit faint.

effects.description: Ward save: 6%
Spell resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Black Homily
skillTree.description: A macabre parade of balefire and haunting chants often herald the coming of Hei Lianhua, twisting the winds of magic into a sinister spectrum.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: +30% for all enemy spellcasters
	(local region)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +20%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Corrupted Vessel
skillTree.description: Hei Lianhua's mortal body seeps with the black taint that used to be sealed within her. Her presence can wither even the most sacred of grounds.

effects.description:
Attrition: +30% casualties suffered from Vampiric territory attrition
	(enemy armies in local province)

Vampiric corruption: +4
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Worshippers of Death
skillTree.description: The dark maiden of Nongchang has fostered a growing cult willing to spread her aura of death across Cathay, despite her lack of sentience to acknowledge its existence.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Chanters and Chanters (Occult Lanterns) units
	(Lord's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

effects.description:
Attribute: Unbreakable for Chanters and Chanters (Occult Lanterns) units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ancient Fear
skillTree.description: The tale of the Maiden of the Black Lotus is as perhaps as old as the weathered terracotta sentinels that dot Cathay's landscape, and indeed it has cultivated a history of fear, enough for the locals to form traditions around its legend.

effects.description:
Control: +5
	(local province)

Control: +4
	(all adjacent provinces)

Leadership: +4 when fighting against Cathay
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Malevolent Haunters
skillTree.description: The terrible host of ghosts and supernatural entities that flock upon Hei Lianhua bring great dread and gloom upon any pitiable township unfortunate to be in the vicinity.

effects.description:
Attribute: "Causes Terror" for Hungry Ghost units
	(Lord's army)

Control: -6
	(local enemy province)

skillTree.name: All the Evils of Nongchang
skillTree.description: Hei Lianhua, unwillingly, has become the avatar of all the evils that resides deep within Nongchang's murky waters and of its people; every sin and every grudge, it is a festering cancer that continues to gnaw at Grand Cathay to this day.

effects.description: Ability: "All The Evils of Nongchang"
Replaces ability: "Taint of the Black Lotus"

skillTree.name: Avatar of Profane Sin
skillTree.description: A colossal phantasm from the dark waters of Nongchang is summoned; said to be manifested from the corrupted husk of the high priest, an Elder Wuxing Sage, who originally sacrified Hei Lianhua to banish the evils from the land.

effects.description: Mount: Avatar of Profane Sin

skillTree.name: Xiaolan's Spirit Seal
skillTree.description: The necromancer recites from forbidden scrolls an ancient rite used to trap and bind wandering spirits into a chosen corpse, thereby enslaving the creature in undeath.

effects.description: Cooldown: -30% to "Xiaolan's Spirit Seal"
Overcast spell: "Xiaolan's Spirit Seal Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "Xiaolan's Spirit Seal"
Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Xiaolan's Spirit Seal"
Overcast spell: "Xiaolan's Spirit Seal Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Call From the Beyond
skillTree.description: A rusty bell is rang and hateful spirits of the dead are roused from the underworld, clawing and howling, upon the mortal realm.

effects.description: Cooldown: -30% to "Call From the Beyond"
Overcast spell: "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "Call From the Beyond"
Spell number of uses: +1 for "Call From the Beyond" and "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Range: +50% to "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Passive ability: "Power of Yin"

skillTree.name: Ancestral Haunting
skillTree.description: The victim's ancestors erupt from their ancient graves, sapping away their bravado with thoughts of guilt and despair as they get dragged into the afterlife.

effects.description: Cooldown: -20% to "Ancestral Haunt"
Overcast spell: "Ancestral Haunt Upgraded"
Miscast chance: -50% to "Ancestral Haunt Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "Ancestral Haunt"
Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Ancestral Haunt"
Winds of magic cost: -3 to "Ancestral Haunt Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Ancestral Haunt Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Curse of Weng-Chang
skillTree.description: Although renowned for miraculous life magicks, mystical Weng-Chang was also home to a darker manipulation of the jade winds.

effects.description: Cooldown: -10% to "Curse of Weng-Chang"
Overcast spell: "Curse of Weng-Chang Upgraded"
Cooldown: -20% to "Curse of Weng-Chang"
Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Curse of Weng-Chang"
Winds of magic cost: -3 to "Curse of Weng-Chang Upgraded"
Effect range: +10 to "Curse of Weng-Chang Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Curse of Weng-Chang Upgraded"
Passive ability: "Evasion"

skillTree.name: Soul Vampirism
skillTree.description: Outstretching both gnarled hands, the jade-blooded vampire drains its victim's spirit, leaving an empty, withered husk.

effects.description: Cooldown: -20% to "Soul Vampirism"
Overcast spell: "Soul Vampirism Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "Soul Vampirism"
Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Soul Vampirism"
Winds of magic cost: -3 to "Soul Vampirism Upgraded"
Range: +50 to "Soul Vampirism Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Soul Vampirism Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Gate of the Spirit Realm
skillTree.description: A small rift to the afterlife is opened by the sorceror, drawing forth the attention of powerful spirits that reside within.

effects.description: Spell number of uses: +1 for "Gate of the Spirit Realm"
Cooldown: -30% to "Gate of the Spirit Realm"
Ability: "Gate of the Spirit Realm"
Spell number of uses: +2 for "Gate of the Spirit Realm"
Cooldown: -50% to "Gate of the Spirit Realm"
Winds of magic cost: -3 to "Gate of the Spirit Realm"
Ability: "Gate of the Spirit Realm"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Greater Arcane Conduit
skillTree.description: "Forces of Necromancy, hear the request of your most-studious adept: flow through me according to my will!"

effects.description: Passive ability: "Greater Arcane Conduit"

skillTree.name: Aura of Supremacy
skillTree.description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5

Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.name: Army of the Damned
skillTree.description: "A wall of decaying flesh and bone slowly advanced towards us, implacable and utterly remorseless."

effects.description:
Melee defense: +4 for Chanters, Returned, Crypt Ghouls, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +3 for Chanters, Returned, Crypt Ghouls, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units 
	(Lord's army)

Melee defense: +6 for Chanters, Returned, Crypt Ghouls, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee defense: +8 for Chanters, Returned, Crypt Ghouls, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Call of the Night
skillTree.description: "Can you hear it… the call of the night? Time for its children to arise and swarm."

effects.description:
Speed: +6% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +9% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cursed Ghosts
skillTree.description: In the East, tales of ghosts are often brought up to scare and discipline children or spread around as petty entertainment, but in crumbling abodes and forgotten clanhouses, lingering spirits exist, languishing in murderous rage.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +15% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +4% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +20% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monsters of the Nether
skillTree.description: The Cathayan underworld is home to many immetarial creatures, and some of these aren't as benevolent as Cathay's venerated ancestors.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: +6% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +8% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +9 for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: +12% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +10% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Revenant Heroes
skillTree.description: "Charge, brothers! We are sworn-comrades in life, and now, in DEATH! For Xen Yang! For the Dragon Emperor!"

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Eastern Terrors
skillTree.description: Grandy Cathay is home to many supernatural abominations that stalk the night and maliciously feast upon the populace's nightmares.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +15% for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +11 for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)
Ability: "Magical Animus"

skillTree.name: Dead of the Orient
skillTree.description: The endurance of boogeymen and other nightly frights that haunt the Cathayan psyche is perhaps one of the more intriguing aspects of their culture.

effects.description:
Armour +8 for Chanters, Returned, Crypt Ghouls, Unearthed Laborers, Revenants, Blood Lions and Jiangshi units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +10% for Chanters, Returned, Crypt Ghouls, Unearthed Laborers, Revenants, Blood Lions and Jiangshi units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cruel Souls
skillTree.description: Not only satisfied in enacting revenge, some spirits go as far as to inflict misery and torment upon the living out of misplaced wrath and perceived injustices.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Infantry: +7 for Spirit host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui, Pale Lady, and Underworld Gate Guardian units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spirit host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui, Pale Lady, and Underworld Gate Guardian units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Nightmares of the Dark
skillTree.description: At sunset, when all the windows are barred and the crows have cawwed, the dread denizens of the night encroach upon the world of mortals from the shadows.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Fell bats, Dire wolves, Mogwai, Devil of Dark Omen and Yaoguai (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Fell bats, Dire wolves, Mogwai, Devil of Dark Omen and Yaoguai (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Parade of Midnight
skillTree.description: Deathless horses with eyes that burn like brimstone and hooves that leave trails of ghostflame; the jade banner flashes its accursed colors.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: +15% for Youxia revenants and Cursed Jade Carriage units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for Youxia revenants and Cursed Jade Carriage units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)
Ability: "Undeath Resurgent"
Replaces: "Magical Animus"

skillTree.name: The Restless Dead
skillTree.description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.name: Undying Horde
skillTree.description: Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

effects.description: The Dead Rise Again: +5% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle

Casualty replenishment rate: +2%
	(Lord's army)
The Dead Rise Again: +10% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle

Casualty replenishment rate: +4%
	(Lord's army)
The Dead Rise Again: +15% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle

Casualty replenishment rate: +6%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Children of the Night
skillTree.description: A powerful, vigorous Lord of Darkness will see the Children of the Night gather unto them.

effects.description:
Character experience gain: +10%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Upkeep: -3%
	(Lord's army)

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Upkeep: -6%
	(Lord's army)

Character experience gain: +30%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Upkeep: -9%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Darkling Skies
skillTree.description: The sun is no ally of the dead - a sky scorched black, or darkest night, will invigorate the Unliving.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +6%
	(Lord's army)

Ambush success chance: +16%
	(Lord's army)

Ambush success chance: +30%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Immortal Horror
skillTree.description: Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)
Battle healing cap: +50%
Wound recovery time: -1

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enemy battle reinforcement time: +25%
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%

skillTree.name: Guile & Glamour
skillTree.description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.

skillTree.name: Necrarch
skillTree.description: W'soran's scions are masters at the art of Necromancy, to dabble in such will be a boon.

effects.description:
Growth: +8
	(local province)

Growth: +20
	(local province)

	(local province)

skillTree.name: Eternal Warden
skillTree.description: This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.

skillTree.description: This Lord can hear the thoughts of mortals for leagues around, and plan accordingly.
